description: Manage Azure ServiceBus subnet-rule in networkruleSet for namespace.

commands.name: az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule add
commands.summary: Add a Virtual-Network-Rule for network rule of namespace.
commands.syntax:
az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule add --namespace-name
                                                                  --resource-group
                                                                  [--subnet]
examples: az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule add --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --subnet id={subnetId} ignore-missing-endpoint=True

commands.name: az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule remove
commands.summary: Remove network rule for a namespace.
commands.syntax:
az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule remove --namespace-name
                                                                     --resource-group
                                                                     [--subnet]
examples: az servicebus namespace network-rule-set virtual-network-rule remove --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --subnet id=/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetname}/subnets/{subnetname}
